EV isolated method: Before EV isolation, plasma was thawed at 4 °C and centrifuged at 15,000 g for 15 min at 4 °C. For miRNA sequencing, EVs were purified by the miRCURY Exosome Isolation Kit – Serum and Plasma (Exiqon, Denmark) according to manufacturer’s instructions. Precipitation agent was added to 0.5 ml cleared plasma and incubated at 4 °C for 1 h. Precipitated EVs were then pelleted, resuspended in 0.3 ml Resuspension buffer and analysed by nano particle tracking analysis (NTA).
